special_text:
When you cast this spell, target player skips their next combat phase.
[+1]: Create a 3/1 white Knight creature token with “As long as it’s your turn, this creature has indestructible.”
[0]: Exile a permanent card from your graveyard. Return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of your next turn’s end step.
[-3]: At the beginning of your next turn’s end step, destroy all creatures.
